title: The Housekeeper Onee-San Became My Personal Maid. Doesn’t That Mean, She Is Already My Wife? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Mature   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clingy Lover   Doting Love Interests   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Older Love Interests   R-15
author: Mitsuba Sora
description:
Touma Tsukishiro is going to be a sophomore in high school this spring.

After his parents passed away due to a car accident during his elementary school, he has been living alone at home.  However, he has been blessed with friends, enjoys school and living alone.

Nevertheless, every once in a while, he would like to have a hot meal prepared by someone else.

So, he asks for a housekeeper.

He expects a nice lady to come ……

The person who comes is  a beautiful young woman with big breasts.

Her name is Kanako Sakurada.

She has a calm personality, but in fact she has an ulterior motive.

She wants to find her ideal husband while working as a housekeeper.

And she is in love with Touma.

So, she wants to stop being a housekeeper and live with him.

Touma is a little troubled, but decides to live with her.

Thus, Touma’s daily life becomes a very lively one.>
